meta.title: Avalon Cerritos - Apartments in Cerritos, CA | AvalonBay Communities | AvalonBay Communities

meta.name: title
meta.content: Avalon Cerritos - Apartments in Cerritos, CA | AvalonBay Communities

div.span: We believe elevating where you live is about blending it seamlessly with how you live. We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience and possibility, Avalon Cerritos offers thoughtfully designed studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments and flats. Imagine entertaining in modern kitchens with quartz stone countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a pool and spa, state-of-the-art fitness center, and resident lounge with pool table and entertaining kitchen. Our community is conveniently located off of Artesia Fwy, making commuting a breeze. This is not just apartment living. This is living up.

div.h2: The service. The standards. The life.

a.div: Great service is one of the things we think about most. We start with selecting passionate people. Then we let them put that passion to work. Our people are a vital part of what shapes the character of each Avalon community.

We strive to align our standards with yours, delivering an experience that lives up to them. We know you've put a lot into getting to where you are in life. We believe where you live should reflect that. So we put ourselves into making sure it does.

Effortless. Enjoyable. Truly comfortable living is both. That's why we go out of our way to choose locations and to design amenities that put so much within reach. So you can live easy without even trying.

div.div: Room dimensions, square footage, and features shown on the floor plan drawings are approximate and may vary between individual apartments that have similar layouts. Furniture shown on the floor plan drawings is representative and individual apartments come unfurnished unless specified otherwise. Quoted rent is per month for new move-ins to the community, based on the move-in date selected. Pricing may vary based on lease term. Quoted rent does not including other fees and charges that may be part of your lease (i.e. utilities, parking, etc.). Please contact the community for details. Prior to signing a lease, quoted rent, specials, availability, and other terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. Washington State - We require our own screening and do not accept comprehensive reusable tenant screening reports.

div.p: Curious about the community layout? You can download the community site map here.

We go to great lengths designing amenities and choosing locations that put everything within reach. Where you live, is where you come alive. In an area flourishing with convenience and possibility, Avalon Cerritos offers thoughtfully designed studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments and flats. Imagine entertaining in modern kitchens with quartz stone countertops, contemporary cabinetry, and stainless steel appliances. Upgrade any home to Furnished+ and enjoy the convenience of turnkey living. Plus, our technology package, AvalonConnect, offers high-speed area WiFi, digital resident services including the ability to submit service requests and pay your rent online, Amazon package lockers, and more. Live your life effortlessly with amenities that include a pool and spa, state-of-the-art fitness center, and resident lounge with pool table and entertaining kitchen. Our community is conveniently located off of Artesia Fwy, making commuting a breeze. This is not just apartment living.
